ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed tomato soup, divided
1 (6 ounce) package STOVE TOP Stuffing Mix for Chicken
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Mix meat, 1/2 cup of the soup, stuffing mix, egg, onion and thyme.
Press evenly into 8x4-inch loaf pan sprayed with cooking spray.
Heat remaining soup with chili sauce in small saucepan.
Spoon over meatloaf just before serving.
title: Family Classic Meatloaf
